attributes.action: Border control for U.K. A point system for immigrants and visa for visitors.
attributes.additional_details:
With so many different cultures coming to the uk it's important to ensure those wishing to live in our communities are happy to live by our laws and rules. If they do not, their visa can be revoked or entry refused. 
Visa and point system can have conditions to ensure there is no drain on the Uk. One visa condition could be Only those who input into the nhs for over a set amount of years can use it. Same for benefits Etc . Check out more visa info: https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Visa_(document)
attributes.background: There are too many reasons to list here why an immigration point system and visitor visa will benefit the UK. From limiting the amount of people seeking to live in UK. national health tourists and refusing undesirables, to welcoming those with a skill or just good character.
